biotools.summary:
Integrated cell-type-specific regulon inference server from single-cell RNA-Seq.

The underlying regulatory mechanisms that induce the identity of cell types or physiological states are normally uncovered in the single-cell RNA-Sequencing (scRNA-Seq) analyses.

Here we propose IRIS3 (Integrated Cell-type-specific Regulon Inference Server from Single-cell RNA-Seq) as the first-of-its-kind web server for CTS-R inference in human and mouse.

integrated cell type specific Regulon inference from single-cell rna seq.
